text: Rajpal Yadav is an Indian actor and comedian who is known for his work in Hindi film industry. He has received several awards such as Filmfare, Screen Awards for his specialization in the genre of comedy. He started his career in Hindi industry in the mid-1990s, but he first gained popularity when he played the lead role in the thriller movie Jungle (2000). Later, Yadav played comedic roles in a number of successful movies like Hungama (2003), Waqt: The Race Against Time (2005), Garam Masala (2005), Phir Hera Pheri (2006) and Dhol (2007). == Sources == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian comedians Category:Actors from Uttar Pradesh
title: Rajpal Yadav
